titleStmt.title: The antient usage in bearing of such ensigns of honour as are commonly call'd arms with a catalogue of the present nobility of England / by William Dugdale ... ; to which is added, a catalogue of the present nobility of Scotland and Ireland, &c.
titleStmt.author: Dugdale, William, Sir, 1605-1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Theater for Moses Pitt ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in:Henry E. Huntington Library and Folger Shakespeare Library.
